welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cheviot, a charming city known for its beautiful scenery and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy our quaint shops, delicious local cuisine, and stunning natural landscapes during your stay. We hope you have a wonderful time here in Cheviot!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky Airport houses all major airlines and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky Airport is home to several regional airlines and offers a smaller, more intimate setting for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky Airport serves as the international terminal and offers a variety of international carriers for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
